text: The best dreams happen when you’re awake.
author: Cherie Gilderbloom

text: Success  is the  ability  to  go  from  failure  to  failure  without  losing  your  enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

text: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Gray

text: Our  life  is  what  our  thoughts  make  it.
author: M. Aurelius

text: Success is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison

text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

text: Failure is simply an opportunity to start again, but wiser.
author: Henry Ford

text: Always choose the most difficult path - you will not meet competitors on it
author: Charles de Gaulle

text: Do whatever you can where you are, using whatever you have
author: Theodore Roosevelt

text: Think like a man of action and act like a man of thought.
author: Henri Bergson

text: Life is measured not by how many years it is, but by how many real life in these years
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: Only two things are infinite — the universe and human stupidity, and I’m not sure about the former.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Success is the child of audacity.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

text: Always forgive your enemies. Nothing annoys them more.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
author: Herman Cain

text: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
author: Cesare Pavese
